Residue module¶

class src.residue.Residue(name)[source]¶
class Residue¶

This class groups informations about a residue.

name¶

Name of the residue (1 letter code)

ca_coords¶

3D coordinates of the residue

set_ca_coords(coords)[source]¶

Sets the coordinates of the Residue.

Parameters:coords (np array) – x,y,z coordinates.
Returns:void
